questions.question: What is the predominant color of the packaging's background?
What material appears to be used for the product packaging?
What is the overall shape of the product's packaging?
What is the primary text displayed prominently on the packaging?
What weight, in kilograms, is indicated on the packaging?
What is the texture of the packaging's surface, visually apparent?
Is there a noticeable logo or branding element visible?
What color is the small circular symbol near the weight indication?
What type of print is used for text and graphics on the pack?
Does the packaging display any barcodes or identification numbers?
What is the apparent finish of the packaging's surface?
Are there any noticeable seams or folds visible in the packaging?
Does the packaging show any additional text beyond brand name?
What is the general style of the packaging design?
Is the packaging primarily descriptive or image-based?
